content.text:
The SPEAKER. The Chair has examined the Journal of the last day's 
proceedings and announces to the House his approval thereof.
  Pursuant to clause 1, rule I, the Journal stands approved.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER

content.text:
Mr. WILSON of South Carolina. Mr. Speaker, pursuant to clause 1, rule 
I, I demand a vote on agreeing to the Speaker's approval of the 
Journal.
content.speaker: Mr. WILSON of South Carolina

content.text:
The SPEAKER. The question is on the Speaker's approval of the 
Journal.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER

content.text:
The question was taken; and the Speaker announced that the ayes 
appeared to have it.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text:
Mr. WILSON of South Carolina. Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas 
and nays.
content.speaker: Mr. WILSON of South Carolina

content.text: The yeas and nays were ordered.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text:
The SPEAKER. Pursuant to clause 8, rule XX, further proceedings on 
this question will be postponed.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER
